dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev just met with Chevron's chairman, Michael Wirth, to talk energy strategy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev just met with Chevron's chairman, Michael Wirth, to talk energy strategy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State met with the Chairman of the Board of Directors of Chevron Corporation, Michael Wirth. During the meeting, the current state and future prospects of strategic cooperation were discussed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he specifically congratulated him on finishing that huge Tengiz field expansion project—that's a massive deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he specifically congratulated him on finishing that huge Tengiz field expansion project-that's a massive deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev emphasized Chevron's key role in the sustainable development of Kazakhstan's energy sector and congratulated Michael Wirth on the successful completion of the Tengiz field expansion project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Tengizchevroil, their joint venture, has been investing there since like, what, 1993?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Tengizchevroil, their joint venture, has been investing there since like, what, nineteen ninety three?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He noted that from 1993 to 2024, the Tengizchevroil joint venture made significant investments in the country's economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Since '93, yeah. Over thirty years of partnership. That's a serious long-term relationship.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Since 'ninety three, yeah. Over thirty years of partnership. That's a serious long-term relationship.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Tokayev really emphasized wanting more Kazakh companies involved in the oil and gas sector moving forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Tokayev really emphasized wanting more Kazakh companies involved in the oil and gas sector moving forward.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President highlighted the importance of increasing the involvement of domestic companies in the oil and gas sector and expressed readiness to deepen cooperation with Chevron on a mutually beneficial and long-term basis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes sense—local content is huge for sustainable development. He also mentioned gas production and petrochemical projects as next priorities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes sense-local content is huge for sustainable development. He also mentioned gas production and petrochemical projects as next priorities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Special attention was given to the continued implementation of major investment projects, including gas production and petrochemical development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Wirth called Kazakhstan a strategic and reliable partner, which is pretty significant coming from a major like Chevron.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wirth called Kazakhstan a strategic and reliable partner, which is pretty significant coming from a major like Chevron.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Michael Wirth, Kazakhstan remains a strategic and reliable partner for Chevron.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And this isn't their first sit-down either—they met back in 2022 as well.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this isn't their first sit-down either-they met back in twenty twenty two as well.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is worth noting that Michael Wirth, Chairman of Chevron Corporation, previously visited Kazakhstan and met with President Tokayev in 2022.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So it feels like this is part of an ongoing dialogue, not just a one-off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it feels like this is part of an ongoing dialogue, not just a one-off.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Mutually beneficial, long-term basis—that phrase came up a lot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Mutually beneficial, long-term basis-that phrase came up a lot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President highlighted the importance of increasing the involvement of domestic companies in the oil and gas sector and expressed readiness to deepen cooperation with Chevron on a mutually beneficial and long-term basis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You get the sense both sides are really committed to deepening that cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You get the sense both sides are really committed to deepening that cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Especially with major investments already in place. It's not just talk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Especially with major investments already in place. It's not just talk.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And with the Tengiz expansion done, they're probably looking at what's next.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And with the Tengiz expansion done, they're probably looking at what's next.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Petrochemicals, gas… lots of room to grow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Petrochemicals, gas... lots of room to grow.
